qas.question: What is an example of a pump component?
In addition to recirculating water, what do condensers do?

answers.text: recover the latent heat of vaporisation
recover the latent heat of vaporisation
recover the latent heat of vaporisation

qas.question: What components raise steam temperature above its saturated vapor point?
What is another name for a coal supply bin?
What mechanism moves coal from a bunker to the firebox?

answers.text: a chain or screw stoking mechanism

qas.question: What is an example of a firebox?

plausible_answers.text: recover the latent heat of vaporisation

qas.question: IN addition to recirculating water, what do bunkers do?
What components raise steam temperature above its saturated firebox point?
What is another name for a firebox?
What mechanism moves coal from a firebox to a bunker?

context: Other components are often present; pumps (such as an <a0_0><a0_2><b5_0>injector<b5_0/><a0_2/><a0_0/>) to supply water to the boiler during operation, <a0_1>condensers<a0_1/> to recirculate the water and <a1_0><a1_1><a1_2><b6_0>recover the latent heat of vaporisation<b6_0/><a1_2/><a1_1/><a1_0/>, and <a2_0><a2_1><a2_2><b7_0>superheaters<b7_0/><a2_2/><a2_1/><a2_0/> to raise the temperature of the steam above its saturated vapour point, and various mechanisms to increase the draft for fireboxes. When coal is used, <a4_2>a chain or screw <a4_0><b9_0>stoking<b9_0/><a4_0/> mechanism<a4_2/> and its drive engine or motor may be included to move the fuel from a supply bin (<a3_0><a3_1><a3_2><b8_0>bunker<b8_0/><a3_2/><a3_1/><a3_0/>) to the firebox. See: <a4_1>Mechanical stoker
